scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Christ centrally positioned on the cross, wearing a loincloth and a golden halo. Two thieves are crucified on either side of him. Below, a group of figures are gathered. On the left, the Virgin Mary, draped in a blue mantle, is shown in mourning, accompanied by other women. On the right, a group of men, some in armor and one wearing a distinctive red and white conical hat, are present. In the background, a walled city with towers and trees is visible. A skull and bones are depicted in the foreground, a common symbol of Golgotha.
